required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Phase 1b Study in Patients With Short-Lasting Unilateral Neuralgiform Headache Attacks (SUNHA)
clinical_study.official_title: An Exploratory Open-Label, Phase 1b, Ascending Dose Study to Evaluate the Effects of Oral 3-[2-(Dimethylamino)Ethyl]-1h-indol-4-yl Dihydrogen Phosphate (Psilocybin, BPL-PSILO) on Cognition in Patients With Chronic Short-Lasting Unilateral Neuralgiform Headache Attacks (SUNHA)

brief_summary.textblock: This exploratory open-label phase 1b, ascending dose study is to evaluate the effects of psilocybin on cognition in patients with Chronic Short-Lasting Unilateral Neuralgiform Headache Attacks (SUNHA)

detailed_description.textblock:
The study aims to:
Determine the safety and tolerability of psilocybin when administered to patients with chronic SUNHA
Determine the effects of psilocybin on cognition when administered to patients with chronic SUNHA
Explore the change in frequency, duration, and intensity of headache attacks with escalating doses of psilocybin in patients with chronic SUNHA

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: An exploratory open-label phase 1b, ascending dose study

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage of patients with treatment emergent AEs (TEAES)
primary_outcome.time_frame: From first dose administered through to the follow up visit, approximately 16 days

primary_outcome.measure: Treatment-related changes in Paired Associates Learning (PAL) scores and evaluation of dose response
primary_outcome.time_frame: From first dose administered until the las dose administered, approximately 11 days

primary_outcome.measure: Treatment-related changes in Spatial Working Memory (SWM) scores and evaluation of dose response
primary_outcome.time_frame: From first dose administered until the las dose administered, approximately 11 days

primary_outcome.measure: Treatment-related changes in Reaction Time Index (RTI) scores and evaluation of dose response
primary_outcome.time_frame: From first dose administered until the las dose administered, approximately 11 days

primary_outcome.measure: Treatment-related changes in Rapid Visual Information Processing (RVP) scores and evaluation of dose response
primary_outcome.time_frame: From first dose administered until the las dose administered, approximately 11 days

primary_outcome.measure: Change in frequency of headache attacks
primary_outcome.time_frame: From screening until the follow up visit, approximately 30 days

primary_outcome.measure: Change in duration of headache attacks
primary_outcome.time_frame: From screening until the follow up visit, approximately 30 days

primary_outcome.measure: Change in intensity of headache attacks
primary_outcome.time_frame: From screening until the follow up visit, approximately 30 days
primary_outcome.description: Patients will complete a diary on a daily basis and capture the intensity of their headaches by assigning a score out of 10 where 0 is pain free and 10 is excruciating pain

clinical_study.condition: Short Lasting Unilateral Neuralgiform Headache Attacks

intervention.description: Psilocybin will be provided in form of dry filled capsules and administered orally in three ascending doses

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
* Diagnosed with chronic SUNHA
Exclusion Criteria:
* Other comorbidities

patient_data.ipd_description: Due to the UK GDPR, individual participant data will not be shared publicly. Group data will be presented in publication after study completion.
